## \_Promise class

Utilities for handling promises.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class _Promise 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [delay](./rc-js-util._promise.delay.md) | <code>static</code> | typeof promiseDelay | Returns a <code>Promise</code> which will resolve to <code>resolveWith</code> after a delay of <code>delay</code> (in milliseconds). |
|  [rejectFalse](./rc-js-util._promise.rejectfalse.md) | <code>static</code> | typeof promiseRejectFalse | Returns a Promise of rejection with the supplied error if the <code>value</code> is false. |
|  [rejectFalsey](./rc-js-util._promise.rejectfalsey.md) | <code>static</code> | typeof promiseRejectFalsey | Returns a Promise of rejection with the supplied error if the <code>value</code> is falsy. |
|  [rejectNull](./rc-js-util._promise.rejectnull.md) | <code>static</code> | typeof promiseRejectNull | Returns a Promise of rejection with the supplied error if the value is <code>null</code> or <code>undefined</code>. |
